data.comment: The big names in today's match at Stade Le Canonnier have now been confirmed.
Wesli De Cremer starts the match. Eupen with the kick-off in Mouscron.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Mouscron have kicked-off the second half at Stade Le Canonnier.
The away team have replaced Benoit Poulain with Menno Koch. This is the first substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
In the minute 47, Goal! Knowledge Musona gives Eupen a 0-1 lead in Mouscron.
Fabrice Olinga is replacing Beni Badibanga for the home team.
At Stade Le Canonnier, Saad Agouzoul has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 62, Mouscron's Deni Hocko has been booked in Mouscron.
Eupen make their second substitution with Konan N'Dri replacing Mamadou Kone.
Marko Bakic (Mouscron) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 74, Serge Tabekou is on a sub for Marko Bakic for Mouscron.
Jens Cools (Eupen) has received a first yellow card.
Eupen move into a 0-2 lead through a Jonathan Heris header.
In the minute 85, Harlem Gnohere is replacing Robbe Quirynen for Mouscron at Stade Le Canonnier.
The match has come to a close in Mouscron. The final score is 0-2.
